pr_title: XRDDEV-944: Fixes to service description detail views

timeline.message: XRDDEV-944: Fixes to service description detail views and minor refactoring

timeline.bodyText: Seems that it's been here before this PR, but it looks a bit ugly when there are two different styles of spacing. Should be { xx } not {xx}.
timeline.author: Riippi

replies.bodyText: I did the 'fix'. But in general I disagree with this change. I think this should be done by prettier and if we're missing it for now(?) currently it will fix it when it is configured, right? So basically this manual work will anyways be done automatically later on.
replies.author: TJaakkola

replies.bodyText: Ok, if it's manual then I'll skip these in the future. I assumed that there would be a setting or "format all" kind of solution for this the itelliJ.
replies.author: Riippi

timeline.author: Riippi

timeline.message: XRDDEV-944: Add spacing according to PR comments
